name: Get to the Roof
description:
This was a game made for Ludum Dare 47. Finished in a weekend it was a lot of fun to put together. 

In this game you got invited to a friend's house to watch the stars on his roof. However, in going up the stairs you get kind of a "deja vu" feeling.  No way is his house this high? You seem to be stuck in a loop. 

Can you break out of the loop before becoming monster food!

Left/Right arrows or joyad move left or right. 

A button on Xbox controller or Left Ctrl on keyboard interact with everything. 

Code on git is available here: https://github.com/soptheturtle/unity_learning/tree/master/GetToTheRoofCode

Please report any bugs to me by commenting here!
